title: Seminar on SSC 2018 Batch
description: We arrange seminars in ssc batch 2018. Here we talk about how they are successful.

title: Debate Compition
description: PCC onganize debate compitition on 26 jun 2018. Debate is a process that involves formal discourse on a particular topic. student are learn many thing from this debate contest.

title: Photo contest Event
description: We organize a photo competition in mid-July. We give some special gifts for the top 10 participants.

title: Seminar on Victory Day
description: On 16 December 2021 we would like to arrange a Victory Day seminar. We request all students to join this seminar.

title: Seminar on Campus Sustainability
description: A seminar on campus sustainability held on 29 july 2021 at our campus. the seminar was graced by the chef guest Ali Amjad Head Master, Zomsher pur high school.

title: Dream Career of New Generation
description: We organized a seminar about Dream Career of New Generation on 3rd April 2021, Saturday at 11: 00 AM â€“ 01: 00 PM. The president of the ceremony honorable Chirman Abdur Rab has much appreciated the program and allowed to organize such a wonderful seminar. This seminar is especially designed for the current & prospective students of PCC to improve the leadership skills and also to create awareness about their future career goals.
